nodes.text: The Nath Goordian heirs were a group of royal heirs to the planet of Nath Goordi. Sometime prior to the Clone Wars they came to be in trouble and Jedi Knight Seek Ryontarr was sent to rescue them. He eventually succeeded; however, there was no record of the heirs returning to Nath Goordi and the world went through a war over who would succeed them. Afterwards, rather than returning to the Jedi Temple, Ryontarr joined the Mind Walkers on Sinkhole Station in the Maw.
